panels.description: Current "Transaction Per Second" based on total_xact_count

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as tps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_xact_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_xact_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: TPS

panels.description: Current "Queries Per Second" based on total_query_count

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as tps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_query_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_query_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: QPS

panels.description: Current value based on derivative of total_query_time /  total_query_count

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("total_query_time"), 1h) / non_negative_derivative(last("total_query_count"), 1h) FROM "pgbouncer_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
$__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag))

from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_query_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_query_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'total_query_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_query_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Avg. query runtime

panels.description: Current avg. wait time to get a connection, per query

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("total_wait_time")) / non_negative_derivative(last("total_query_count")) FROM "pgbouncer_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
$__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag))

from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_wait_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_wait_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'total_query_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_query_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Pool wait time

panels.description: Current Incoming traffic  based on total_received.

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as tps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_received')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_received')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Incoming traffic

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as tps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_sent')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_sent')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "TPS"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_xact_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_xact_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("total_wait_time")) / non_negative_derivative(mean("total_query_count")) FROM "pgbouncer_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
$__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag)) as "Pool wait time"

from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_wait_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_wait_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'total_query_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_query_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "QPS"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_query_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_query_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "Incoming rate"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_received')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_received')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("total_query_time"), 1h) / non_negative_derivative(mean("total_query_count"), 1h) FROM "pgbouncer_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
$__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag)) as "Avg. runtime"

from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_query_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_query_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'total_query_count')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_query_count')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "Outgoing rate"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'total_sent')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'total_sent')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from pgbouncer_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

options.content: Brought to you by:

list.name: dbname
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT dbname FROM admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics WHERE metric = 'pgbouncer_stats' ORDER BY 1;
